metadata.title: CVE-2015-5602 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
sudoedit in Sudo before 1.8.15 allows local users to gain privileges via asymlink attack on a file whose full path is defined using multiplewildcards in /etc/sudoers, as demonstrated by "/home/*/*/file.txt."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5602` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1
sudo-ldap - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sudo package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.16-0ubuntu1').
